name: Neon Flappy Bird
description:
Browser Play Available!!! Neon Flappy Bird was created in 30 minutes!!! Experience a neon-futuristic take on the popular Flappy Bird game! Flap your way to the highest score! Experience a neon-futuristic bird jumping game! Flap your way to the highest score! This game was made in 30 minutes for a game development challenge based on popular games! Work your way to the highest score!
Go through pipes that are continuously speeding up to get the highest score possible!
